QuestData.Title: "Crowleg" Dan
QuestData.Description: Croaker's spoken, matey. "Crowleg" Dan's on da ship yonder.$B$BBest go trace that blaggard, mon. Show'im dis set's not fe be crossed. Gaan back fe Terry when ye keelhaul 'is behind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront "Crowleg" Dan, who is in one of the ships at Scalawag Point. Speak to Handsome Terry when you've completed this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can't believe it was Dan. Did you take care of it yet?
QuestData.RewardText: That's some sad news. Dan was me old friend... AND he owed me money. Either way, if he was working with the Southsea mongrels he got what he deserved.$B$BAs for you, my friend. You're on your way up. Literally.
